en.name: Abu Dhabi Emirate Rural Development Code
en.description:
The purpose of the Development Code is to produce development regulations that govern the City’s physical environment and ensure that the plot use and development is generally consistent with Plan 2030, the long-term vision for the Emirate.

The Code comprises written documents and maps, which show how the following districts are applied to all land and water outside the Urban Growth Boundary, which is divided into Base Districts, Overlay Districts and Plan Districts.

This Code also includes additional development regulations in 500 Series. Procedural and administrative regulations, amendments to the Code and Code Map are included in the 600 Series. Definitions, rules for interpretation of language and boundaries, and rules for measurement are contained in the 700 Series.

ar.name: شروط ومعايير استخدام وتطوير الأراضي خارج نطاق النمو العمراني الإمارة أبوظبي
ar.description: يهدف هذا النظام إلى وضع ضوابط تطويرية تعمل على ضبط المظهر العام للمدن، كما يضمن أن يكون استخدام الأراضي وتطويرها متوافقًا مع خطة 2030 ،والتي تمثل الرؤية المستقبلية طويلة المدى للمدن.
